projects.name: To Do Mapped
projects.desc: I really wanted a platform where I can place markers on a map of various things I'd like to do because I always forget. For example, cool places to see, fun activities, date ideas, etc. This project allows me to zoom in on a map and see places and activities I'd like to do to help me plan trips or events.

projects.name: Wordle Solver
projects.desc: A program that tells you what to guess, in the popular Wordle game, to get as best a score as possible. I created this because I believe this is a fun little challenge to program and helps me beat my friends scores :)

projects.name: Blockzone
projects.desc: Developed an open world voxel game with C++, OpenGL, and a custom engine. Designed multi-threaded, seamless chunk loading to eliminate lag during player movement. Optimized terrain rendering pipeline by using a geometry shader to streamline object rendering, resulting in drastically increased performance from 30 fps to over 200 fps.

projects.name: uMigrate
projects.desc: uMigrate is a social media app for University students. I worked in the Cloud-ops team and did some work for the API team.

projects.name: Yoilith
projects.desc: Top-down shootor game created in Java with many features like random map generation, terrain destruction, explosive weapons, wide range of guns, and combo and score system.

projects.name: Capacitive Touch LED
projects.desc: This project uses a customly designed capacitive touch slider and a button to control the colour of a RGB LED.

projects.name: First Web Game
projects.desc: This is the first project I did back in grade 8. It has a top-down 2D map where you are hunted down by wild animals.
